title: Last Call & other short stories
description: Last Call & other short stories: a compelling variety of tales and countless memorable journeys.From Swiss mountain ranges to small-town Canada, across urban and rural landscapes these stories feature fictitious canines, portrayed in many different roles - companion, hero, fighter, helper - providing the reader with a compelling variety of tales and countless memorable journeys. Publication includes winners from International Short Story Competition.
author: P. Comley
